content.title: Annath Pension Yojana (JBOCWWB)
content.department: Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand
content.details: Annath Pension Yojana (JBOCWWB) is a scheme by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand. This is a 100% State Sponsored Scheme. Only the residents/domicile of the state of Jharkhand can apply to this scheme. Applications for this scheme are accepted online through the official website of the department. In case of the death of the pensioner, the pension will be payable at the rate of the family pension and will be evenly divided among orphans below 18 years of age.
benefits: In case of the death of the pensioner, the pension will be payable at the rate of the family pension and will be evenly divided among orphans below 18 years of age.
eligibility: The deceased should have been domiciled in the state of Jharkhand.
The deceased should have been a Registered Worker with the 'Jharkhand Building and Other Construction Worker Welfare Board (JBOCWW Board)'.
The deceased should have been receiving a pension from the board.
The applicant should be a child of the deceased.
The applicant should have been orphaned after the death of the pensioner.
The applicant should be less than 18 years of age.
documents_required: Proof of Age / Date of Birth
Document establishing the relationship between the deceased and the applicant

faqs.question: Which Department Manages This Scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is managed by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development, Govt. of Jharkhand.

faqs.question: Is This Scheme State Sponsored Or Centrally Sponsored?
faqs.answer: This scheme is a 100% State Sponsored Scheme.

faqs.question: Where Can I Find The Link To The Scheme Guidelines?
faqs.answer: The Scheme Guidelines can be found at this link - https://shramadhan.jharkhand.gov.in/schemmeDetailsShow.action

faqs.question: Can Women Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is open to applicants from all genders.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accept Offline Applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts online applications.

faqs.question: What Is The URL Of The Website Of Comprehensive Labour Management System For Factory Establishment/Worker Registration/Inspection/Management & Grievance Redressal?
faqs.answer: The URL of the website is https://shramadhan.jharkhand.gov.in/home.

faqs.question: Is There Any Application Fee?
faqs.answer: No. The entire application process is completely free of cost.

faqs.question: How Do I Track The Status Of My Application?
faqs.answer: To track the status of your application, follow the stepwise process given in the application process.

faqs.question: How Many Schemes Can Be Selected At A Time From The List Of Schemes In The Application Form?
faqs.answer: The application form allows only one scheme to be selected per application.

faqs.question: By When Can The Applicant Receive The Scheme Benefits?
faqs.answer: The benefits are due within three months of registration.
